Kvothe, The Bloodless KKC
WURG 1G 2 Legendary Creature - Bard Wizard Creature 1/2
2
LEVEL 1 3/3
LEVEL 2 4/5
Auri, Knower of Everything KKC
WU 1WU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 1/2
2 Spells you cast have “Gift a card” and “If the gift was promised, add one mana of any color.”. (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, when it enters, they draw a card.) Whenever you give a gift, you may promise it to yourself and an opponent. If you do, the opponent gets the gift first. If Auri would be dealt damage, she phases out instead.
Denna, The Nameless KKC
R RR 2 Legendary Creature - Human Bard Creature 1/3
2 Vanishing 2, Haste, Skulk (This creature enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it. This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) When Denna, The Nameless enters, create a Treasure token, draw a card, and explore. Treasure
Kote, The Inkeeper KKC
WURG 2R/GW/U 4 Creature - Human Creature 3/4
2 Deathtouch, Trample When Kote, The Inkeeper leaves the battlefield, exile all permanents with mana value four or greater.
Ctheah, The Infinite Sight KKC
URG GUR 3 Legendary Creature - Faerie Demon Creature 0/4
2 Defender, Indestructible Whenever a creature deals damage to Ctheah, The Infinite Sight, gain control of it until your next endstep. On your endstep, exile target creature you control and return it to the battlefield under your control.
Elorin, The Namer KKC
WUR URW 3 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 3/3
2 On your upkeep, put a charge counter on Elorin. {5}: X is equal to the number of charge counters on Elorin. Exile Elorin. Choose one — • Choose up to X permanents. The chosen permanents lose all types and abilities, becoming enchantments named “Stone”. • Choose up to XX permanents. Return the chosen permanents to their owner’s hands. • Deal XXX damage split among any number of targets.
Bast, The Prince of Twilight KKC
RG 2RG 4 Legendary Creature - Faerie Noble Creature 2/2
2 When Bast, The Prince of Twilight or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, put two +1/+1 counters on Bast and deal 2 damage to target opponent. Whenever Bast attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. 1G: Bast gains trample until end of turn.
Broken Bindings KKC
WU WUU 3 Instant Instant
3 Gift a Food (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they create a Food token before its other effects. It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”) If the gift was promised, this spell has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities.) Target player loses 2 life for each spell they control. Counter all spells controlled by them. Food
Burst of Innovation KKC
RG 1RG 3 Sorcery Sorcery
3 Gift a Clue. (You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they create a Clue token before its other effects. It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a Card.”) Create two Treasure tokens and a Food token. If the gift was promised, instead create a Powerstone token and a Food token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”) Clue Treasure Powerstone
Shaed KKC
3 3 Legendary Artifact - Equipment Artifact
1 Equipped creature can’t be blocked and has hexproof. Equip – Pay 2 life
Devi, The Exiled KKC
WR 2RW 4 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 1/3
2 Gift a Treasure Whenever an opponent sacrifices a Treasure, you gain 2 life. When Devi enters, if the gift was promised, create a Powerstone token. Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you and target opponent create a Treasure token. Treasure Powerstone
